## The Doodons
The doodons are small, industrial creatures, known for their ability to establish colony villages on many a station. They have a sort of ant-like caste system, with there being 3 main types: - Papa - Worker - Warrior
## Papa Doodon
Papa Doodon is the ruler of the doodon village. The papa's main job is to establish the village and command the warriors. Starting out, it is the papa who must find an suitable location for the village. The papa is the only starting doodon, and must populate the village. Papa doodon is the only village member that can speak Tau-Ceti basic, which he can use to orchastrate trade deals with the natives of the station.
## Worker Doodons
The worker doodon is responible for foraging for food, and generally being a second pair of hands for the papa doodon. While a part of the hive, the worker possess rudimentary sentience and is able to make descisions independent of the papa. They can retaliate if provoked.
## Warrior Doodons
The warrior doodon is the main defense for the village. They respond to the papa directly, and do not have the mental capacity for independent descision making. The papa can command them using 4 directives: - Stay: Stay at their current location - Follow: Follow the papa doodon - Attack Target: Attack a target that the papa points at - Loose: Makes the warriors feral, attacking anyone who isn't doodon.
